info.author: youyo
info.description:
# Lamblackbox

This is a AWS Lambda function logging library.

## Install

```
pip install lamblackbox
```

## Usage

### API Gateway

Code.

```
import lamblackbox
import json


@lamblackbox.apigateway
def lambda_handler(event, context):
    return {
        "statusCode": 200,
        "body": json.dumps({
            "message": "hello world",
        }),
    }
```

Logged.


Lamblackbox

This is a AWS Lambda function logging library.

Install

pip install lamblackbox

Usage

API Gateway

Code.

import lamblackbox
import json


@lamblackbox.apigateway
def lambda_handler(event, context):

        "body": json.dumps({
            "message": "hello world",
